skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 20% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of decreasing the duration of all enemy buffs by 1 turn. 

Also has a 75% chance of increasing the duration of all enemy debuffs by 1 turn.

skills.desc: Heals this Champion by 3% of their MAX HP whenever an enemy receives damage from a [Poison] debuff.
